dct_description_sm: 1666, issued by Philippi Chetwind, with no change to cartography on 1652 map (Entry 39). Changed title: AMERICÆ Descriptio Nova Impensis PHILIPPI CHETWIND. Engraved by: Will: Trevethen sculp. (within title cartouche). Chetwind's name instead of Seile's, and outline color and full color cartouche
Wagner 368; Tooley 11, 12, & 13; Leighly 24 (Plate VIII); Burden 308 (Plate 308) & 379 (Plate 379); UCB; Wheat 55
